about_the_game:
Sekrets Of The Dungeon is a 2D dungeon crawler platformer in which you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, not stepping aside ... And return home!
Go to a mysterious dungeon, simultaneously uncovering its secrets and making your way through hordes of enemies with one main goal to find and solve the main mystery of this place someday: "The unknown secret source", which no one has yet reached.

Features of the game

  • Explore a vast, interconnected dungeon world filled with secrets and hordes of enemies.
  • Become the master of fate! At the right time, make the right choice in order to eventually reveal the main riddle.
  • More than 30 levels, divided into 3 parts, where you will find: over 100 riddles and puzzles, hordes of enemies and 3 fierce bosses.
  • Earn Crystals! The more of them, the stronger the main character can become.
  • As well as 8 unique soundtracks.

name: Sekrets Of The Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: Sekrets of the Dungeon - a 2D platformer in the genre of Dungeon Crawler, where you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, without stepping aside... And go home!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
